H0.text: What sea bird has the Latin name Corvus Marinus. Black Guillemot

H1.text: What sea bird has the Latin name Corvus Marinus. Common Murre

H2.text: What sea bird has the Latin name Corvus Marinus. Puffin

H3.text: What sea bird has the Latin name Corvus Marinus. Cormies

A4.text: The common murre is placed in the guillemot (murre) genus Uria (Brisson, 1760), which it shares with the thick-billed murre or Brunnich's guillemot, U. lomvia.

A5.text: Common Murre - Uria aalge - USGS Patuxent Bird Identification InfoCenter

A6.text: Interactive range map of Uria aalge at IUCN Red List

A7.text: The name 'Cormorant' is derived from Latin corvus marinus, 'sea raven'.
